en_us: Customize an armour stand
Gettin' Handsy

Right click the joint of a part to start editing
Ever felt like Armour Stands looked a bit boring? Better Armour Stands lets your Armour Stands strike all the poses you want! Simply use a Book and Quill to edit Armour Stands.
Armour stands will have arms by default, and can be altered with a book and quill.\n\nThis allows one to create custom statues and interesting displays.
To modify an armour stand, write one of the codes in a book and quill, then use it on the armour stand.\n\nMultiple codes can be written on separate pages to apply multiple modifiers at once.
The following codes will toggle the specific feature:
Toggle the arms of the armour stand
Click to copy
Toggle the base plate of the armour stand
Toggle the size of the armour stand
Toggle the gravity of the armour stand
Toggle the visibility of the armour stand.\nHolding a book with this code will reveal\nnearby invisible armour stands.
Toggle rotating of the armour stand
Disable interactions with the armour stand
Enable interactions with the armour stand.\nHolding a book with this code will reveal\nnearby locked armour stands.
The following codes activate editing of armour stand parts:

Edit a part of the armour stand by looking at its "joint".
- Hold sneak to enable "snapping"
- Left click to invert this pose
- Right click to stop editing

Edit a part of the armour stand by looking at its "joint".
If an arm/leg is selected, the other arm/leg pose is mirrored.
- Hold sneak to enable "snapping"
- Left click to invert this pose
- Right click to stop editing
Move the armour stand around you.\n- Hold sneak to enable "snapping"\n- Right click to stop editing
Rotate the armour stand.\n- Hold sneak to enable "snapping"\n- Right click to stop editing
Flip the full pose of the armour stand
- Look at a part of the armour stand to reset this pose.\n- Sneak to fully reset the armour stand.
Items can be placed in the head or arm slots:
Look at the head or shoulders of the armour stand to place an item from the offhand into this slot.
Armour stand data can be copied and pasted:
Copy modified features onto the armour stand items in your offhand.
Copy features from the copied armour stand items in your offhand to the armour stand.
